thread.title: Labour veteran Michael Meacher dies
thread.title_full: Labour veteran Michael Meacher dies - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Labour veteran Michael Meacher dies
text:
0
Have your say
VETERAN Labour MP and former government minister Michael Meacher has died after suffering a short illness, it was confirmed today.
The 75-year-old Labour politician had been in the Commons since 1970 and served as an environment minister under Tony Blair.
Mr Meacher, the MP for Oldham West and Royton, also served in the frontbench teams of Labour leaders John Smith and Neil Kinnock.
